scripts.build: bun run generate:tokens && bunx hardhat build
scripts.test:nodejs: bun run build && bunx hardhat test nodejs
scripts.deploy:tokenlist:local: bun run generate:tokens && bunx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TokenWhitelist.hardhat.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:tokenlist:arb:testnet: bun run generate:tokens && bunx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TokenWhitelist.arbitrum-sepolia.ts --network arbitrumSepolia
scripts.deploy:catalog:local: bunx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/DeckCatalog.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:catalog:arb:testnet: bunx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/DeckCatalog.ts --network arbitrumSepolia
scripts.deploy:registry:local: bunx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Registry.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:registry:arb:testnet: bunx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Registry.ts --network arbitrumSepolia
scripts.deploy:factory:local: bunx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/FactorySystem.hardhat.ts --network localhost --parameters ./src/parameters/factory/factory.hardhat.json
scripts.deploy:system:local: bun run deploy:tokenlist:local && bun run deploy:catalog:local && bun run deploy:registry:local && bun run deploy:factory:local
scripts.deploy:system:arb:testnet: bun run deploy:tokenlist:arb:testnet && bun run deploy:catalog:arb:testnet && bun run deploy:registry:arb:testnet && bun run deploy:factory:arb:testnet
